sentences: Co-Chair Martins Barata explained that the contact group would focus on guidance to the Joint Implementation Supervisory Committee (JISC) and that issues related to JI are also being considered under the Article 9 review and the AWG-KP.
He proposed that the COP/MOP decision focus on the JISC s revised management plan and funding situation.
No interventions were made by parties.
IETA warned against turning JI Track 2 into a second CDM, noting fundamental differences between the two mechanisms.
